p: Mbarara Town (population 195,000) is located in the Mbarara District of Uganda, 275 km southwest of the capital city, Kampala. The Mbarara Regional Referral Hospital (MRRH) HIV clinic initiates ART in more than 1,000 patients per year and offers comprehensive HIV care services, including ART provided through the Ugandan Ministry of Health with support from the Presidentâ€™s Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief, the Global Fund, and the Family Treatment Fund [ 19].
